name: save_artifact
description: Save a file (document, image, etc.) as an artifact in the project. Use this tool when you generate files that users might want to download or reference later.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project to save the artifact in

content.description: The content of the artifact. Use base64 encoding for binary files (images), plain text for text files.

encoding.description: Content encoding. Use 'base64' for binary files, 'text' for text files.

artifact_id.description: Unique identifier of the saved artifact

s3_key.description: S3 object key where the artifact is stored

url.description: Presigned URL to access the artifact

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was created
